name: 2022 5th Asia Conference on Machine Learning and Computing
content: PUBLICATION: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be published in IEEE CPS, which will be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, etc for indexing. Selected papers will be published in International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing as a special issue, which will be indexed by Inspec, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
